body:
Hello everybody! I recently went and bought a server. It is a 24/7 hosted vanilla survival server, and I have decided to make it a Mindcrack/Hermitcraft/The Cube style server. Any avicus players can apply, just add me on skype (downfallgaming123) and tell me how trustworthy you are, and why you want to play. It is 1.7.5

Here are some rules:

-NO xray, or any other hacks.

-Don't build your base at spawn, this will be a town with shops

-Don't grief

-Don't bully - Racism, Homophobia and Sexism is NOT tolerated.

-Work together. Don't be a doosh and kill everyone. Pvp is on, because I am planning on building an arena.

-No stealing

-DO NOT LEAVE FLOATING TREE TOPS

-Don't rage when you die!

-Leave the land as is was, unless far away from civilization or you are building there (eg. no tearing up local beaches of decimating dirt areas.)

-You see a community chest full of chicken. Only take what you need.

-Pranks are allowed, with special rules.

1. Pranks should not alter a players chests or valuable items.

2. The home could be moved, as long as EVERY SINGLE block is there.

3. Leave a sign with your name on it

4. Two people doing one prank is allowed. (E.G me and Raging filling Budah's house with sheep as a team)

5. Be fair, and don't rage when you have been pranked! You can prank them back!


I am looking forward to hosting this and I hope you will enjoy playing, I am sorry if you are denied its just the server isn't massive. The server is 100% vanilla and I will NOT op abuse in any way. It is hosted in EU and recording is allowed. The number on 'Tab' is the deaths number, try not to die a lot ;)

The IP Is: 37.59.134.176:25592

(I will remove this ip if needed)

Good luck applying, and have fun.

-Lego
